name: 10-team-profile-generator
description: This assignment was assigned by the U.C. Berkeley Extension Full-time Full Stack Flex Boot Camp. This is assignment 10 for the program. In this assignment I created a command line application that generates an HTML containing team creation information. The program takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person. This program also features test driven development using jest.
